slides.title: Welcome to Foundation Level
slides.content:
# CA International Foundation

The **entry point** to global accounting qualification.

## What You Will Learn

- **FA1** - Recording Financial Transactions
- **MA1** - Management Information
- **FAB** - Accountant in Business
- **FFA** - Financial Accounting

## Level Structure

| Module | Focus |
|--------|-------|
| FA1 | Double entry |
| MA1 | Cost basics |
| FAB | Business context |
| FFA | Financial statements |

slides.title: Recording Transactions
slides.content:
# FA1 - Double Entry

## Accounting Equation

```
Assets = Liabilities + Equity
```

## Double Entry Rules

| Account Type | Debit | Credit |
|--------------|-------|--------|
| Assets | Increase | Decrease |
| Liabilities | Decrease | Increase |
| Equity | Decrease | Increase |
| Income | Decrease | Increase |
| Expenses | Increase | Decrease |

## Books of Record

- Journal
- Ledger
- Trial Balance

slides.title: Management Information
slides.content:
# MA1 - Costing Basics

## Cost Classification

| By | Types |
|----|-------|
| Element | Material, Labor, Overhead |
| Behavior | Fixed, Variable |
| Function | Production, Admin, Selling |

## Cost Flow

```
Prime Cost = Direct Materials + Direct Labor

Production Cost = Prime + Overheads

Total Cost = Production + Admin + Selling
```

slides.title: Financial Accounting Basics
slides.content:
# FFA - Statements

## Financial Statements

| Statement | Shows |
|-----------|-------|
| Income statement | Performance |
| Balance sheet | Position |
| Cash flow | Liquidity |

## Key Adjustments

| Adjustment | Treatment |
|------------|----------|
| Accruals | Expense incurred |
| Prepayments | Paid in advance |
| Depreciation | Asset reduction |
| Bad debts | Write-off |

slides.title: Depreciation Methods
slides.content:
# Asset Value Reduction

## Methods

| Method | Pattern |
|--------|--------|
| Straight-line | Equal |
| Reducing balance | Declining |

## Formulas

```
Straight-line:
= (Cost - Residual) / Life

Reducing balance:
= NBV x Rate
```

## Journal Entry

```
Dr Depreciation Expense
Cr Accumulated Depreciation
```

slides.title: Inventory Valuation
slides.content:
# Stock Accounting

## Valuation Rule

```
Lower of Cost and NRV

NRV = Selling Price - Costs to Sell
```

## Cost Methods

| Method | Flow |
|--------|------|
| FIFO | First in first out |
| Weighted average | Average cost |

## Impact

- Balance sheet: Current asset
- Income statement: Cost of sales

slides.title: Bank Reconciliation
slides.content:
# Reconciling Cash

## Process

```
Bank statement balance
+ Outstanding deposits
- Unpresented cheques
= Adjusted balance

Should equal cash book
```

## Timing Differences

| Item | Adjust |
|------|--------|
| Unpresented cheques | Bank |
| Outstanding deposits | Bank |
| Direct debits | Cash book |
| Bank charges | Cash book |

slides.title: Trial Balance
slides.content:
# Proving Accuracy

## Purpose

```
List all balances
Debits = Credits
```

## Errors NOT Revealed

| Error | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| Omission | Missed completely |
| Commission | Wrong account |
| Principle | Wrong class |
| Original entry | Wrong amount |
| Compensating | Balance out |

slides.title: Control Accounts
slides.content:
# Receivables and Payables

## Receivables Control

```
Opening balance
+ Credit sales
- Cash received
- Bad debts
- Returns
= Closing balance
```

## Payables Control

```
Opening balance
+ Credit purchases
- Cash paid
- Returns
= Closing balance
```
